languages.text: "Раз уж об этом зашла речь, Лорд-капитан — почему вы не следуете этой доброй традиции? На ваших палубах столь пестро... я хотела сказать — шумно. Чернь не только разговаривает, но иногда еще и кричит или поет. Зачем вы дозволяете подобную разнузданность? Разве {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g} не благородных кровей?"

traits.locale_text: "А со слугами дружить неположено — им же вырезают грязные языки, чтобы не нарушали обет безмолвия. Кстати, почему у тебя на корабле все иначе? Чернь такая шумная. Не только разговривает, но иногда еще и кричит или поет... Разве Вольный Торговец не благородных кровей? Или таковы традиции твоей династии?".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain, why do you not follow this honoured tradition? Your decks are so garish — apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble don't just chatter, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such a lack of restraint? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are highborn, are they not?"
languages.original_text: "Раз уж об этом зашла речь, Лорд-капитан — почему вы не следуете этой доброй традиции? На ваших палубах столь пестро... я хотела сказать — шумно. Чернь не только разговаривает, но иногда еще и кричит или поет. Зачем вы дозволяете подобную разнузданность? Разве {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g} не благородных кровей?"

traits.locale_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain — why do you not follow this honored tradition? Your decks are so dappled... Apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble does not just speak, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such lack of restraint? The Rogue Traders are highborn, are they not?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain — why do you not follow this honored tradition? Your decks are so dappled... Apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble does not just speak, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such lack of restraint? The Rogue Traders are highborn, are they not?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain, why do you not follow this honored tradition? Your decks are so garish — apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble don't just chatter, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such a lack of restraint? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are highborn, are they not?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain, why do you not follow this honored tradition? Your decks are so garish — apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble don't just chatter, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such a lack of restraint? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are highborn, are they not?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain, why do you not follow this honoured tradition? Your decks are so garish — apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble don't just chatter, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such a lack of restraint? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are highborn, are they not?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “既然我们谈到了这个话题，你为什么不遵守这样的光荣传统呢，舰长大人？你的甲板上实在是太浮夸了——抱歉，我是说太吵了。那些乌合之众不仅仅总是喋喋不休，有时还会大喊大叫，甚至会唱歌。你为什么会允许这样的放纵行为？{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}难道不是贵族吗？”
languages.original_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain, why do you not follow this honoured tradition? Your decks are so garish — apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble don't just chatter, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such a lack of restraint? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are highborn, are they not?"

traits.locale_text: “既然我们谈到了这个话题，你为什么不遵守这样的光荣传统呢，舰长大人？你的甲板上实在是太浮夸了——抱歉，我是说太吵了。那些乌合之众不仅仅总是喋喋不休，有时还会大喊大叫，甚至会唱歌。你为什么会允许这样的放纵行为？{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}难道不是贵族吗？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain, why do you not follow this honoured tradition? Your decks are so garish — apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble don't just chatter, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such a lack of restraint? Rogue Traders are highborn, are they not?"

languages.text: «Ya que saca el tema, Lord Capitán, ¿por qué no sigue esta honorable tradición? Sus cubiertas son tan estridentes... perdón, quiero decir ruidosa. La plebe no solo charla, sino que hasta grita y canta. ¿Por qué permite tal falta de contención? ¿Es que los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g} no son nobles?».
languages.original_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain, why do you not follow this honoured tradition? Your decks are so garish — apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble don't just chatter, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such a lack of restraint? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are highborn, are they not?"

traits.locale_text: «Ya que saca el tema, Lord Capitán, ¿por qué no sigue esta honorable tradición? Sus cubiertas son tan estridentes... perdón, quiero decir ruidosa. La plebe no solo charla, sino que hasta grita y canta. ¿Por qué permite tal falta de contención? ¿Es que los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g} no son nobles?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「そして、この主題は破られたのです。ロード・キャプテン、なぜこの名誉ある伝統に従わないのですか？あなた方の甲板はとても派手…失礼、騒々しいという意味です。雑踏はおしゃべりだけでなく、時には叫び、歌うことさえあります。なぜそのような自制心の欠如を許すのですか？{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}はハイボーンでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain, why do you not follow this honoured tradition? Your decks are so garish — apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble don't just chatter, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such a lack of restraint? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are highborn, are they not?"

traits.locale_text: 「そして、この主題は破られたのです。ロード・キャプテン、なぜこの名誉ある伝統に従わないのですか？あなた方の甲板はとても派手…失礼、騒々しいという意味です。雑踏はおしゃべりだけでなく、時には叫び、歌うことさえあります。なぜそのような自制心の欠如を許すのですか？{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}はハイボーンでしょう？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Und da wir nun schon über dieses Thema sprechen, Lord Captain, warum folgt Ihr dieser altehrwürdigen Tradition nicht? Eure Decks sind so grell — verzeiht, so laut, meinte ich. Der Pöbel plaudert nicht nur, manchmal ruft er und singt sogar. Warum gestattet Ihr diesen Mangel an Selbstbeherrschung? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} sind doch Hochgeborene, oder nicht?"
languages.original_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain, why do you not follow this honoured tradition? Your decks are so garish — apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble don't just chatter, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such a lack of restraint? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are highborn, are they not?"

traits.locale_text: "Und da wir nun schon über dieses Thema sprechen, Lord Captain, warum folgt Ihr dieser altehrwürdigen Tradition nicht? Eure Decks sind so grell — verzeiht, so laut, meinte ich. Der Pöbel plaudert nicht nur, manchmal ruft er und singt sogar. Warum gestattet Ihr diesen Mangel an Selbstbeherrschung? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} sind doch Hochgeborene, oder nicht?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « À ce propos, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, pourquoi ne mettez-vous pas cette honorable tradition en pratique ? Vos ponts sont tellement criards... Pardon, je veux dire bruyants. Le peuple ne se contente pas de discuter, mais il lui arrive de crier et même de chanter. Comment pouvez-vous laisser régner l'anarchie de la sorte ? Les {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g} ne sont-ils pas censés être de sang noble ? »
languages.original_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain, why do you not follow this honoured tradition? Your decks are so garish — apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble don't just chatter, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such a lack of restraint? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are highborn, are they not?"

traits.locale_text: « À ce propos, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, pourquoi ne mettez-vous pas cette honorable tradition en pratique ? Vos ponts sont tellement criards... Pardon, je veux dire bruyants. Le peuple ne se contente pas de discuter, mais il lui arrive de crier et même de chanter. Comment pouvez-vous laisser régner l'anarchie de la sorte ? Les {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g} ne sont-ils pas censés être de sang noble ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hazır konusu açılmışken Lord Kaptan, acaba sen neden bu geleneğe uymuyorsun? Geminin güverteleri çok cırtlak... Pardon, gürültülü diyecektim. Ayaktakımı sadece sohbet etmekle kalmıyor, bazen bağırıp şarkı bile söylüyor. Bu ölçüsüzlüğe neden izin veriyorsun? Neticede {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacirler{/g} de soylu, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "And since the subject has been breached, Lord Captain, why do you not follow this honoured tradition? Your decks are so garish — apologies, I meant noisy. The rabble don't just chatter, sometimes they shout and even sing. Why do you allow such a lack of restraint? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are highborn, are they not?"

traits.locale_text: "Hazır konusu açılmışken Lord Kaptan, acaba sen neden bu geleneğe uymuyorsun? Geminin güverteleri çok cırtlak... Pardon, gürültülü diyecektim. Ayaktakımı sadece sohbet etmekle kalmıyor; bazen bağırıp şarkı bile söylüyor. Neden onları hiç dizginlemiyorsun? {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacirler{/g} soylu değil mi?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
